item.title: Trump is reportedly planning the military parade he has long wanted for his 79th birthday
item.description: He called for one in his first term, but the price tag was said to be too high at $92 million.

item.title: Doral is home to one of Trump’s golf clubs. Its mayor is pleading with the president to spare Venezuelan families from deportation: ‘These families do not want handouts’
item.description: Trump has ended two federal programs that allowed more 700,000 Venezuelans to live and work legally in the U.S.

item.title: Turnover for S&P 500 CFOs tops 17% this year as the C-suite job ‘really just takes a toll’
item.description: The high CFO turnover rate tracked with the similarly steep CEO turnover figures.

item.title: Jamie Dimon concerned Trump tariffs will leave the U.S. out in the cold: ‘America First is fine, as long as it doesn’t end up being America alone’
item.description: Jamie Dimon's annual letter to shareholders warned that Trump's tariffs may push America's former allies to rely more heavily on nations like China an...

item.title: EU leaders split over hitting U.S. services sector in retaliation to Trump trade tariffs
item.description: While France and Germany are calling for an "aggressive" response, Ireland, Italy and Spain want a "calm and measured" approach.
